messages.content: What is a good chunk size for searching through documents with word embeddings?
It depends on your use case, but a good rule of thumb is to keep the number of documents per chunk between 10 to 100.
What would be a good wat of measuring the quality of a search result?

Typical metrics like precision, recall, and F1 score do not capture the full picture. A better way to measure the quality of search result is to evaluate if the search result is relevant to the query, and useful to the user.
